Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications/Female Urogenital Diseases/Urologic Diseases/Kidney Diseases/Nephritis/Pyelitis
Record.BroaderTerm: Female Urogenital Diseases and Pregnancy Complications
Record.Description: Inflammation of the KIDNEY PELVIS and KIDNEY CALICES where urine is collected before discharge, but does not involve the renal parenchyma (the NEPHRONS) where urine is processed.
